name: Compass Minerals International, Inc.
description: Compass Minerals International, Inc. is a leading producer of essential minerals, primarily focused on providing high-quality salt and plant nutrition products. Founded in 1993 and headquartered in Overland Park, Kansas, Compass Minerals operates extensive mining and production facilities, including one of the largest salt mines in North America. The company’s salt products are used for a variety of applications, including road safety, water treatment, and food processing. In addition to salt, Compass Minerals is a key player in the production of plant nutrients, including sulfate of potash, which is vital for high-value crops and sustainable agriculture. The company is dedicated to environmental stewardship and sustainable practices, ensuring that its operations minimize ecological impact while meeting the growing global demand for minerals. With a strategic focus on innovation and efficiency, Compass Minerals aims to enhance its market position and drive growth through continuous improvement of its processes and products. The company serves a diverse customer base, including municipalities, agricultural producers, and industrial clients, thus playing a crucial role in supporting infrastructure and food supply chains. Compass Minerals is committed to delivering value to its shareholders through disciplined capital allocation and operational excellence.
